Node.Text: Good evening, Mr. Devlin. I'm going to the third floor.
Have you picked up any more clues?
To be honest, Mr. Devlin, I am uncertain of your intentions.
Sometimes it seems that you genuinely wish to help, yet you may still seek to sabotage.
You cannot be trusted. I will not place any more lives at stake.
You must promise not to tell anyone.
Depending on what you say, I may have to tell the police.
Then I'm afraid I have nothing to share. Good night, Mr. Devlin.
I cannot give you names, but I can say this: the viper is cold and cunning. She is blinded by golden greed, and it may be her downfall.
Node.Hint: According to James, the killer "viper" is someone who is calculating and greedy.

Node.Text: I have said too much! I'll now be off.
